1.text: Heat up 1 US tbsp (15 mL) of canola or peanut oil in a pot.

2.text: Fry 1 clove of garlic and 1/2 a carrot in the hot oil.

3.text: Stir in 1/4 of a can of coconut milk and 1-2 tbsp (14-28 g) of curry paste.

4.text: Mix in 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into cubes.

5.text: Pour in 2 cups (473 mL) of chicken broth, bring it to a boil, and reduce the heat.

6.text: Stir in the rest of the coconut milk and the juice of 1 lime.

7.text: Add 1/4 cup (26 g) of green onions and simmer the soup for 10-20 mins.

8.text: Ladle the soup over cooked rice or noodles in serving bowls.

9.text: Garnish each serving of soup with cilantro and other desired toppings.
